page.title: 15SHOPPING CENTRE POLLOK
page.content: One of the major inputs into the area has been the Pollok Shopping Centre which was opened to the public in l979.The centre comprises of 22,760 sq.metres and has 3 large superstores and over 30 shop units.There is also a variety of shops distributed in small groups throughout the block and the area is also well served by mobile shopping vans. A survey by Levern Primary revealed that most people who come to the centre came for the variety of shops. Most shoppers were impressed by the wide selection of food and clothing and they felt they got good value for money.The most popular way of getting to the centre is by bus.{Shoplifting:} l3 out of l5 shopkeepers said it was the biggest problem that they have;and one said that children are the main culprits.
